Question: A year and a half later, this person gave birth to her second child, Desiderio Alberto Arnaz IV, known as Desi Arnaz, Jr.
Hints: This person was determined to prove her teachers wrong, and returned to New York City in 1928.
Her aorta had ruptured in a second location and this person quickly lost consciousness.
When he was born, I Love Lucy was a solid ratings hit, and this person and Arnaz wrote the pregnancy into the show.
